author: tkormann
msg: - xlink:href is now handled with multiple levels for linear and radial
- Attributes and stop elements are inherited.
- References are resolved on demand for each attribute (but the documents
are cached by the BufferedDocumentLoader is it's referenced multiple times).
Next, I will do the same for filter and pattern.

author: hillion
msg: The SVG transcoder can now be used for DOM serialization.

author: tkormann
msg: move base 64 encoder/decoder to the util package

author: tkormann
msg: huge commit to simplify the way to get the style in the bridge.
The get/setViewCSS methods have been removed from the BridgeContext.
An additional method on CSSUtilities has been added: getComputedStyle(element).
Notice that now, you don't need to save/restore the ViewCSS for external
reference or documents anymore. Just use the CSSUtilities.getComputedStyle
